gallery.heading: The extraordinary gift for every occasion
gallery.sub_heading: The {kw} poster is the perfect gift for every occasion. The personalized {kw} immortalizes special moments and memories. It will not only give you pleasure, but also your loved ones with whom you share these moments.
gallery.button_text: Create your {kw} poster now and show love to your beloved ones!

one.heading: Astronomically correct
one.paragraph_one: We use the star catalogue of the European Space Agency’s Hipparcos mission, a high-precision star catalogue generated by the space-based Hipparcos telescope. We use this star catalogue to determine the positions of the stars for each date and place in the past or future.
one.paragraph_two: Your map is therefore always astronomically correct!

two.heading: Immortalize the most beautiful moments
two.paragraph_one: Remind yourself and your loved ones of special moments and memories. Exactly these moments make up a life and you can now immortalize this as a work of art. Choose the place and date of the special moment and personalize the poster with your personal dedication or message.
two.paragraph_two: You can create masterpieces that arouse emotions, remind you of special moments in life and show how much a very special person means to you.

one.heading: Moons and years go by, but a beautiful moment shines through life.
one.name: Franz Grillparzer

one.heading: Extraordinary
one.paragraph: Present your loved ones with magic moments.

shipping:
Shipping and payment information

Payment information

Possible payment methods: Paypal, credit card, instant bank transfer, direct debit

The period for delivery begins upon receipt of payment and ends with the expiry of the last day of the period. If the last day of the period falls on a Saturday, Sunday or a general holiday recognised by the state at the place of delivery, the next working day shall take the place of such day.

Shipping

Delivery zone | Shipping | Delivery time

United Kingdom | 8,90 € | 1-5 days + production time
Germany | 4,90 € | 1-3 days + production time
EU | 8,90 € | 2-4 days + production time

Production time

PDF | 0 working days
Posters | 1 – 2 working days
Forex plate | 3 – 4 business days
